The Memorial Union.name: The Memorial Union
The Memorial Union.description: "The Memorial Union is the student activity center at Oregon State University... It contains a ballroom, cafeteria, bowling alley, shops, and study areas." - Wikipedia

Cascadia Market.name: Cascadia Market
Cascadia Market.description: "Cascadia Market, located in the International Living-Learning Center on the south side of campus, is an on-campus market featuring a variety of grocery items, international specialty foods, household items, and grab-and-go meals." - OSU Website

American Dream Pizza.name: American Dream Pizza
American Dream Pizza.description: "Budget pizzeria with eclectic art on the walls features thick-crust pies whole or by the slice." - Google

Cibelli's Pizza.name: Cibelli's Pizza
Cibelli's Pizza.description: "Local pizzeria offering hand-tossed, NYC-style pies & gluten-free crust options in a casual space." - Google

Block 15 Brewing Co.name: Block 15 Brewing Co
Block 15 Brewing Co.description: "Laid-back brewpub crafting beers including lagers & IPAs plus serving sandwiches & pasta." - Google

Evergreen Indian Cuisine.name: Evergreen Indian Cuisine
Evergreen Indian Cuisine.description: "Homey, long-standing Indian eatery featuring South Indian tandoori dishes & a buffet." - Google
